eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Luce, MI; AT 07:28 AM ON SEP 10, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:28 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
This is a coordinated monthly test of the Emergency Alert System, originating from the Luce County Emergency Operations Center.

Equipment that can quickly warn you during emergencies is being tested. If this had been an actual emergency such as a tornado, a toxic material release, or other local emergency that affects your safety, official messages would have followed the alert tone.

This concludes this test of the Emergency Alert System.
